reviews.productTitle: Klever Kits 400+PCS Fashion Design Crafts for Kids, Art and Crafts, DIY Sewing Kits with 3 Mannequins for Girls Aged 8-12, Birthday Presents, Toys for Kids
reviews.text: Firstly, some of the parts were missing from the MANNEQUINS, which I thought were a pretty vital part of the ‚Äúkit‚Äù, (especially because it only came with 3 to begin with), so there ended up being only 2 usable mannequins. Nobody seems to know how to spell the word ‚Äúmannequins‚Äù, but it is spelled like this: ‚Äúmannequins‚Äù, and it is actually also on the spellcheck menu on your phone, right in front of your face. SECONDLY, (although I don‚Äôt know why I bothered to type that word, as no one reading this review will know what it means), everything that *was* included with the kit was extremely ugly. The sewing thread that was included, (which people apparently didn‚Äôt know about, but *would* know about if ONLY they could read), was complete unusable trash. How do you think clothing is made, guys. Basic hand sewing is not hard, and is a basic life skill that everyone should learn. Please watch a YouTube video and teach yourself and your children how to do so. Not with this kit though, because the thread is crap. DON‚ÄôT GET THIS CRAP KIT.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 25, 2025
reviews.title: Stupid and Ugly

reviews.productTitle: Klever Kits 400+PCS Fashion Design Crafts for Kids, Art and Crafts, DIY Sewing Kits with 3 Mannequins for Girls Aged 8-12, Birthday Presents, Toys for Kids
reviews.text: My little niece is starting to sew to dress her dolls, so I got this set for her, do she has all she needs for her designs. There are lots of different fabrics, ribbon, accessories, other small detailed items, etc. The best part is the set comes with mini mannequins/bodyforms that she can use while designing. She loves it and it entertains her during her Summer break. I am thinking to get another set/s for my daughter's upcoming birthday party, to keep her friends busy.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2024
reviews.title: Great complete set for someone who loves sewing and designing outfits

reviews.productTitle: Klever Kits 400+PCS Fashion Design Crafts for Kids, Art and Crafts, DIY Sewing Kits with 3 Mannequins for Girls Aged 8-12, Birthday Presents, Toys for Kids
reviews.text: This set is really cute! It is especially great for kids interested in design. There are 4 dress design options given with instructions, plus a lot of fun extras. The girls picked the dress design they wanted, I cut the fabric and placed it on the mannequin. Then they decorated it themselves. I love that it comes with needle and thread too. Only negative we had was that the mannequins are kind of hard to open again once you put them together. So don‚Äôt forget to look at the instructions - it‚Äôs important to put the white plastic piece inside before closing it.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 23, 2024
reviews.title: Cute!

reviews.productTitle: Klever Kits 400+PCS Fashion Design Crafts for Kids, Art and Crafts, DIY Sewing Kits with 3 Mannequins for Girls Aged 8-12, Birthday Presents, Toys for Kids
reviews.text: If your child is interested in fashion design, this is a fun and unique way to encourage their passion. The box is full of different materials - cloth, ribbons, and other things - to make the dresses pretty and unique. And since you won't be gluing or sewing anything, you could always use the resources again and again. It would be great if it had more stands. Or included an easy way to actually sew the clothes for use on dolls.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 22, 2024
reviews.title: A Fun Way to Encourage Fashion Artists
